channel.title: Teach and Retire Rich
channel.itunes:subtitle: Financial Education for Educators
channel.itunes:author: Dan Otter
channel.itunes:summary: Teacher Dan Otter discusses concepts from his book Teach and Retire Rich, which details how educators and other school employees can take advantage of the unique wealth building tools at their disposal.
channel.description: Teacher Dan Otter discusses concepts from his book Teach and Retire Rich, which details how educators and other school employees can take advantage of the unique wealth building tools at their disposal.

item.title: Teach and Retire Rich Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Dan Otter
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduction to Teach and Retire Rich
item.itunes:summary: In this first episode Dan describes his teaching and financial advocacy background. He also introduces the Teach and Retire Rich formula.

item.title: Teach and Retire Rich Episode 2
item.itunes:author: Dan Otter
item.itunes:subtitle: Overview of the 403(b) retirement plan and an interview with Scott Dauenhauer, CFP
item.itunes:summary: In this second episode Dan discusses the 403(b) retirement plan. He also interviews certified financial planner Scott Dauenhauer.
